headline: Southwest Airlines (LUV): Valuation Update Following New T-Mobile WiFi Deal and International Route Expansion
summary: If you have been tracking Southwest Airlines (LUV), there is a lot to unpack lately. The headline development is a new partnership with T-Mobile, which will bring free unlimited WiFi to all Rapid Rewards Members starting this October. In addition, Southwest is pushing into new territory with its first new international route in years, now serving St. Maarten, and broadening its U.S. network through a fresh interline deal with EVA Air. Moves like these are about more than just headlines, as...
